infosSupplementaires.description: This conceptual data model (MCD) outlines the database architecture for a comprehensive e-commerce platform. It structures the complete user journey, from product browsing (using categories, stock, and characteristics) to a persistent shopping cart (PANIER) and a full order fulfillment pipeline (COMMANDE), including payment and delivery tracking.

This Logical Data Model (MLD) translates the conceptual e-commerce model into a concrete relational database schema. It defines all tables, establishes primary keys and foreign keys to build relationships, and resolves all many-to-many associations into dedicated junction tables. This model is fully normalized and ready for SQL implementation.
The final design of the website, developed using the Laravel framework. The site prioritizes a strong visual identity and intuitive ergonomics to ensure a high-quality user experience.

infosSupplementaires.description: High-fidelity prototype designed on Figma before coding. Everything was made from scratch without any template.

This project focuses on planning and coordinating the full production process of a Pilot pen, from product data verification to final manufacturing. The Gantt chart outlines the entire workflow and its dependencies, divided into two main phases: Lot A (upstream planning) and Lot B (production execution).
The main dashboard displaying the full product catalog with advanced filtering options (category, type, color) and real-time stock levels.
An interface allowing users to search for and select an existing retailer from the database or create a new one.
The order building screen where users can filter products, add specific items to their cart, and choose a delivery method.
A recap view detailing the selected retailer, delivery dates, list of ordered items, and the total price before validation.
A detailed view of a specific item showing technical specifications, pricing, current stock, and a product image.
